item.title: Abolish ICE DenverShowing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denverüì£Call To Actionüì£ Contact Your Denver City Council people (including...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverShowing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

üì£Call To Actionüì£

Contact Your Denver City Council people (including At-Large - Ortega & Kniech) and ask:

‚Ä¢ What is the status of collective bargaining with Denv...er Police Dept?
‚Ä¢ Will you commit to allow the police contract to go to arbitration?
‚Ä¢ Will you commit to no raises for DPD?

DEMAND - no new raises for Denver Police Department!

A 2-year contract with DPD is not just irresponsible, it is immoral. The current contract allows DPD to lock in a $5M raise in 2022 while no other city employees are allowed to collectively bargain AND face drastic cuts to their agency budgets. The 2021 budget includes minor increases to programs designed as alternatives to policing (STAR, etc.) with funding from external sources ‚Äì these budgetary increases did not decrease the DPD budget in any way.

Tell your councilperson to stand firm and say NO to this contract!

[image:
-Ortega, At Large 720-337-7713 Ortegaatlarge@denvergov.org @OrtegaAtLarge
-Kniech, At Large 720-337-7712 kniechatlarge@denvergov.org. @KniechAtLarge
-Sandoval D1 720-337-7701 districtone@denvergov.org @sandovalcd1
-Flynn D2 720-337-2222 kevin.flynn@denvergov.org.
-Torres D3 720-337-3333 jamie.torres@denvergov.org @TorresDenver3
-Black D4 720-337-4444 kendra.black@denvergov.org
-Sawyer D5 720-337-5555 denvercouncil5@denvergov.org @DenverCouncil5
-Kashmann D6 720-337-6666 paul.kashmann@denvergov.org @CouncilmanPaul6
-Clark D7 720-337-7777 jolon.clark@denvergov.org @LuckyDistrict7
-Herndon D8 720-337-8888 christopher.herndon@denvergov.org @ChrisjHerndon

item.title: On June 25, under the pressure of mass protests against racist...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

On June 25, under the pressure of mass protests against racist police killings, Governor Jared Polis issued an executive order which would open an independent investigation into Elijah McClain‚Äôs death, led by state Attorney General Phil Weiser. This was after Aurora District Attorney Dave Young declined to file any charges against the killers, then the city of Aurora opened a sham investigation led by a former cop which was terminated because it was plainly not ‚Äúindependent‚Äù.... Now it is up to Phil Weiser to decide whether the cops and paramedics responsible for Elijah‚Äôs death will face any criminal charges.

But just this week, Governor Polis quietly loosened the scope of the investigation, allowing Weiser to investigate for ‚Äúoffenses‚Äù, not just ‚Äúcriminal activity‚Äù related to Elijah‚Äôs death, opening up the possibility for him to come back with watered down charges against the killers, like we saw in Breonna Taylor‚Äôs case. Polis also took out the words that suggest someone caused the death of Elijah McClain.

Polis must think that the movement isn‚Äôt paying attention, that we‚Äôve been subdued by the repressive arrests of movement leaders, and now he can reel back his investigation without opposition in the streets. He is wrong.

Join us for an emergency action to make it clear that we are still here and we are not going anywhere until we get justice for Elijah McClain!

MASKS REQUIRED (OVER YOUR NOSE & MOUTH!) & PLEASE KEEP DISTANCE BETWEEN YOURSELF AND OTHERS.

See More

SAT, NOV 21 AT 1:00 PM MST

EMERGENCY ACTION: Eyes on Weiser! Justice for Elijah McClain!

Colorado State Capitol

¬∑ DenverCauses ¬∑ 337 people

item.title: Most inmates at the El Paso County jail weren‚Äôt given masks...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Most inmates at the El Paso County jail weren‚Äôt given masks until AFTER the jail became one of the state‚Äôs largest COVID-19 outbreaks when hundreds of inmates tested positive. Hundreds of people in shared living spaces had zero masks until last week.

The more than 1,200 inmates inside the El Paso County jail on any given day were not provided masks until last week, when the jail became the site of Colorado‚Äôs second-largest coronavirus out‚Ä¶

denverpost.com

El Paso County jail inmates weren‚Äôt given masks prior to one of Colorado‚Äôs largest COVID-19 outbreaks

The more than 1,200 inmates inside the El Paso County jail on any given day were not provided masks until last week, when the jail became the site of Colorado‚Äôs second-largest coronavirus out‚Ä¶The more than 1,200 inmates inside the El Paso County jail on any given day were not provided masks until last week, when the jail became the site of Colorado‚Äôs second-largest coronavirus out‚Ä¶

Nearly 150 protesters marched through the streets of downtown Denver denouncing both presidential candidates on Thursday, November 5, 2020.

A popular chant throughout the evening was ‚ÄúNo borders, no walls, no USA at all!‚Äù

The protest was advertised based on a flyer and language from CrimethInc.‚Äôs EVERYBODY OUT! Resources for a Season of Post-Election Unrest, which was published prior to election day.

item.title: Abolish ICE Denver+8Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverTonight PSL joined in a car caravan from the GEO Aurora ICE detention center...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver+8Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Tonight PSL joined in a car caravan from the GEO Aurora ICE detention center to the Denver County Jail and Denver Women‚Äôs Correctional Facility to say FREE THEM... ALL!

Across the country, millions of people are trapped in ICE detention, jails, and prisons during this deadly global pandemic. Thousands have needlessly died, and hundreds of thousands have been infected. We demand mass humanitarian release NOW! #FreeThemAll

Abolish ICE DenverThis live video has ended.

November 9 at 4:50 PM

Caravan and Vigil - #FreeThemAllThis video is now available to watchWatch NowColorado People's Alliance was live.

***seguido por espa√±ol***
#COVID19 threatens the lives of everyone imprisoned, with outbreaks in more than two dozen carceral setting in Colorado right now. We ...know #DetentionIsDeadly and the only safe course of action for people in cages, the workers at those facilities and the #publichealth is to #FreeThemAll.
*** #COVID19 representa una amenaza a toda nuestra gente encarcelada. Colorado se encuentra con brotes en mas de dos docenas en lugares carcelarios ahora mismo. Sabemos que la detenci√≥n es mortal y que el √∫nico curso de acci√≥n seguro, tanto para las personas en jaulas, los trabajadores en estos lugares y la #saludpublica es liberarlos a todos.

Immigration and Customs Enforcement‚Äôs decision to return to business as usual and the GEO detention center in Aurora are not keeping our community safe. Experts like Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes are calling for compassionate humanitarian release of all imprisoned people. Tonight, we will hear from loved ones of those jailed, impacted individuals and the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado about how your donations can free our people!
***La decisi√≥n de la migra de regresar a operativos ‚Äúnormales‚Äù conjunto con como GEO maneja su centro de detenci√≥n, ponen en peligro la seguridad de nuestra comunidad. Expertos como Dr. Carlos Paredes est√°n clamando por una liberaci√≥n humanitaria de todas las personas encarceladas. ¬°Esta noche escucharemos de los seres queridos de la gente aprisionada, de personas detenidas y del Fondo de Liberaci√≥n de Inmigrantes en Colorado sobre como sus donativos pueden rescatar a nuestra gente!

This event is brought to you by the American Friends Service Committee, the Colorado People‚Äôs Alliance, the Colorado Freedom Fund AND the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.

item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Via AFSC Colorado...
item.content:encoded:
Via AFSC Colorado

***sigue en espanol ***

With the recent outbreak, COVID 19 threatens the lives of everyone imprisoned. #DetentionIsDeadly.

Immigration and Customs Enforcement’s decision to return to business as usual and its GEO detention center in Aurora are not keeping our community safe, and experts agree, the only answer is to #FreeThemAll. Just last month, Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes called for compassionate humanitarian release of all imprisoned people. Join us Monday, November 9th at 6:00 pm at 3130 Oakland in Aurora for a Caravan around the detention center and virtually on FB Live. We will hear from family and impacted individuals and from the Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund about how your donations can free our people! This event is brought to you by the American Friends Service Committee, the Colorado People’s Alliance, the Colorado Freedom Fund AND the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.

Con el reciente brote, COVID 19 amenaza la vida de todos los encarcelados. #DetentionIsDeadly. La decisión del Servicio de Inmigración y Control de Aduanas de volver a la normalidad y su centro de detención GEO en Aurora no mantiene a nuestra comunidad segura, y los expertos coinciden en que la única respuesta es #FreeThemAll. El mes pasado, el Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes pidió la liberación humanitaria compasiva de todas las personas encarceladas. Únase a nosotros el lunes 9 de noviembre a las 6:00 pm en 3130 Oakland en Aurora para una caravana alrededor del centro de detención y virtualmente en FB Live. ¡Escucharemos a familiares e individuos afectados y al Fondo de Libertad de Inmigrantes de Colorado sobre cómo sus donaciones pueden liberar a nuestra gente! Este evento es presentado por el American Friends Service Committee, la Colorado People's Alliance, el Colorado Freedom Fund Y el Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund.
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family....
item.content:encoded:
Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family.

A BLM protestor was ran over on their scooter this summer wearing a BLM mask in Denver and many in community feel that it's a major DPD coverup.

Chris was wearing a BLM mask, he tried to get his friends out of harms way and the driver redirected and targeted him, plowing into a group of black kids and killing Chris. All the kids are from out of town and coming back for the DPD press conference Tuesday

Tomorrow we expect police to say they found the car but no driver and DPD may even be closing the investigation b/c the car was supposedly reported stolen before the incident.
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Gaby and Lupe are selling cebiche & Spring Fling Cake this weekend. They‚Äôre raising money to pay for legal fees for...
item.content:encoded: Gaby and Lupe are selling cebiche & Spring Fling Cake this weekend. They’re raising money to pay for legal fees for family members, and legal fees are incredibly high. Buy a meal and #KeepFamiliesTogether this weekend. tinyurl.com/solidaritymeals-10-17
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline...
item.content:encoded:
Via @coloradopeoplesalliance and the Detention Lifeline

üö®Community Alertüö®
The Aurora Fire Chief notified council members of a COVID-19 outbreak at the GEO detention facility this afternoon. There are 19 confirmed positive cases! We know we can't count on GEO to keep our community members who are detained safe. We demand that GEO releases as many folks as possible on humanitarian parole and ensures that those who are sick receive the proper medical care! We will keep monitoring the situation and connect with folks inside the facility to ensure their health and safety.

Read our full press release here: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1

üö®Alerta a la comunidadüö®
El jefe de bomberos de Aurora notificó a los miembros del consejo sobre un brote de COVID-19 en el centro de detención de GEO en Aurora esta tarde. ¡Hay 19 casos positivos confirmados! Sabemos que no podemos contar con GEO para mantener seguros a los miembros de nuestra comunidad que están detenidos. Exigimos que GEO libere a la mayor cantidad posible de personas en libertad condicional humanitaria y garantice que los enfermos reciban la atención médica adecuada. Seguiremos al tanto de la situación y nos conectaremos con las personas dentro de las instalaciones para garantizar su salud y seguridad.

Lea nuestro comunicado de prensa completo aquí: https://coloradopeoplesalliance.ourpowerbase.net/civicrm/mailing/view?id=1271&reset=1
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: "Community showed up on Tuesday afternoon in LoDo to make sure Palantir Tech feels unwelcome in Denver....
item.content:encoded:
"Community showed up on Tuesday afternoon in LoDo to make sure Palantir Tech feels unwelcome in Denver.

Palantir Technologies is ICE’s technology backbone, provides the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants."

Photos by @buffalo_heart_images
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with...
item.content:encoded: Conditions are extremely difficult for our @denverpsl comrades inside.Lillian, Joel & Eliza are dealing with difficulties accessing medication and sanitary products, serious COVID risks, abuse from guards, and intense stress from isolation (23+ hours a day). Their civil rights are also being violated with Denver, Adams and Arapahoe County working together to deny our comrades a bond hearing. Our comrades suffer yet they are still thinking of others — constantly telling communjty about the conditions of their cell mates and others in the jail and agitating for their release as well. @justiceforelijahmcclain PSL Denver and Say Their Names 5280 are heroes and freedom fighters. And we need to be fighting harder than ever for them. See you Saturday!
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver
